column4: Hey guys! :D Can anyone have a look at my /var/log/messages file to see what might be causing my ubuntu 9.04 to reboot randomly. Time was : 17:43, 17:50 and 18:17,  18:21. can it be a video driver problem? It is a Acer Aspire M5630 . Intel video card. 82G33/G31 Express Integrated Graphics Controller.  Thanks guys! http://paste.ubuntu.com/251630/
